Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/59th
ShortDescription: #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near King Drive/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near King Drive/59th.

  • Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, 59th, Indiana, 55th, then resume their normal route on King Drive.
  • Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 55th, Michigan, 59th, then resume their normal route on King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
